${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Arbitr.NAME: ARBITR
${ModID}:Arbitr.DESCRIPTION: Channel a âˆž Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust. If you would take damage, the attacker gains vigor instead of dealing damage until this Bloon is destroyed. Vigor does not trigger if you are the target.
${ModID}:Arbitr.FLAVOR: It'll be your turn when I say it's your turn!

${ModID}:ArmorUp.NAME: Armor Up
${ModID}:ArmorUp.DESCRIPTION: Target Bloon gains Armored 2 per Act.

${ModID}:Armored.NAME: Armored
${ModID}:Armored.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Armored, plus 1 Armored per Act. Add a Bomb into your discard pile.
${ModID}:Armored.FLAVOR: You might need to bring bigger darts

${ModID}:Bomb.NAME: Armored
${ModID}:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Armored, plus 1 Armored per Act. Add a Bomb into your discard pile.
${ModID}:Bomb.FLAVOR: You might need to bring bigger darts

${ModID}:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
${ModID}:Avalanche.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. At the start of your turn, before drawing your hand, deal 1 damage per act to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BananaFarm.NAME: Banana Farm
${ModID}:BananaFarm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:BFB.NAME: BFB
${ModID}:BFB.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 4 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:BloonEmbiggen.NAME: Bloon Embiggen
${ModID}:BloonEmbiggen.FLAVOR: I'm figgering on embiggering and embiggering and embiggering and embiggering!

${ModID}:BloonReinforcements.NAME: Bloon Reinforcements!
${ModID}:BloonReinforcements.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, if no Basic Bloons are in your Draw Pile. Draw !M! random Basic Bloons from your Draw Pile.

${ModID}:BloonRemovalTime.NAME: Bloon Removal Time
${ModID}:BloonRemovalTime.DESCRIPTION: If any enemies intent to attack, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, gain 1 Energy.

${ModID}:BloontoniumGasBloon.NAME: Bloontonium Gas Bloon
${ModID}:BloontoniumGasBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 4 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2. On Damaged: You gain ðŸŸª.

${ModID}:BolsteredBloon.NAME: Bolstered Bloon
${ModID}:BolsteredBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health and 10 Shield. Exhaust. This Bloon gains 5 Health each time you play a Bloon.

${ModID}:BoosterBloon.NAME: Booster Bloon
${ModID}:BoosterBloon.DESCRIPTION: Draw a Booster Latch to your hand. Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:BoosterLatch.NAME: Booster Latch
${ModID}:BoosterLatch.DESCRIPTION: Lowest Delay, Highest Health Bloon gains 1 delay and !D! Health. Multi-attack Bloons are prioritised.

${ModID}:BringItDown.NAME: Bring it Down
${ModID}:BringItDown.DESCRIPTION: Add a Rock Bloon to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Shuffle a Avalanche into your draw pile per Act.

${ModID}:BuddyBloon.NAME: Buddy Bloon
${ModID}:BuddyBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health and 12 Shield. Exhaust. Target deals no damage to you until this Bloon is destroyed.

${ModID}:CeramicBloon.NAME: Ceramic Bloon
${ModID}:CeramicBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:CrushingTime.NAME: Crushing Time
${ModID}:CrushingTime.DESCRIPTION: ALL Armored Bloons gain Armored 2 per Act.

${ModID}:DoubleCeramicBloon.NAME: Double Ceramic Bloon
${ModID}:DoubleCeramicBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Double Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:DoubleLeadBloon.NAME: Double Lead Bloon
${ModID}:DoubleLeadBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Double Bloon with !D! Health, Armored 2. Charges 2.

${ModID}:DoubleYellowBloon.NAME: Double Yellow Bloon
${ModID}:DoubleYellowBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 1 Delay Double Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:EchoesOfAvalanche.NAME: Echoes of Avalanche
${ModID}:EchoesOfAvalanche.DESCRIPTION: Add an Avalanche card per Act to your hand.

${ModID}:ExtractorBloon.NAME: Extractor Bloon
${ModID}:ExtractorBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust. When you deal damage: This Bloon gains 5 Health.

${ModID}:FearfulAura.NAME: Fearful Aura
${ModID}:FearfulAura.DESCRIPTION: ALL Enemies loses 4(6) Strength for the rest of this turn.

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Lowest Delay, High Health Bloon gains 10 health. Multi-attack Bloons are prioritised.

${ModID}:GlueShot.NAME: Glue Shot
${ModID}:GlueShot.DESCRIPTION: Reduce target's Damage and Block gains by 25%.

${ModID}:GlueStorm.NAME: Glue Storm
${ModID}:GlueStorm.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL creatures Damage and Block gains by 25%.

${ModID}:GrowthGasBloon.NAME: Growth Gas Bloon
${ModID}:GrowthGasBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 5 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2. On Damaged: All other Bloons gain 5 Health.

${ModID}:Immunity.NAME: Immunity
${ModID}:Immunity.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL damage and HP loss you take to 1 for one turn. Cannot stack.

${ModID}:ImprovedFortification.NAME: Improved Fortification
${ModID}:ImprovedFortification.DESCRIPTION: Lowest Delay, Highest Health Bloon gains 1 delay and 30 Health. Multi-attack Bloons are prioritised.

${ModID}:LeadBloon.NAME: Lead Bloon
${ModID}:LeadBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health and Armored 2.

${ModID}:LeadCasing.NAME: Lead Casing
${ModID}:LeadCasing.DESCRIPTION: Lowest Delay, Highest Health Bloon gains Armored 4. Multi-attack Bloons are prioritised.

${ModID}:LeadCoatingBloon.NAME: Lead Coating Bloon
${ModID}:LeadCoatingBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health and Armored 6.

${ModID}:LeadZeppelin.NAME: Lead Zeppelin
${ModID}:LeadZeppelin.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 5 Delay Bloon with !D! Health and Armored 4. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Leer.NAME: Leer
${ModID}:Leer.DESCRIPTION: If target is Weakened, Reduce target's Dexterity by 1. Otherwise, apply 1 Weak.

${ModID}:LetUsRock.NAME: Let's Rock!
${ModID}:LetUsRock.DESCRIPTION: Add a Rock Bloon to your hand. It gains Armored 1 per Act and costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:MOAB.NAME: MOAB
${ModID}:MOAB.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 4 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:MonkeyRemovalTime.NAME: Monkey Removal Time
${ModID}:MonkeyRemovalTime.DESCRIPTION: If no enemies intent to attack, Add 1 Lead Zeppelin to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Otherwise, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:MoreCardsNow.NAME: More Cards Now!
${ModID}:MoreCardsNow.DESCRIPTION: Scry 3. Draw a card for each Act.

${ModID}:NestedBlue.NAME: Nested Blue
${ModID}:NestedBlue.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 1 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust. When this Bloon is destroyed, play a Red Bloon.

${ModID}:NestedGreen.NAME: Nested Green
${ModID}:NestedGreen.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust. When this Bloon is destroyed, play a Nested Blue.

${ModID}:NestedYellow.NAME: Nested Yellow
${ModID}:NestedYellow.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2. When this Bloon is destroyed, play a Nested Green

${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Pre-emptive Strike
${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn: If any enemy intending to attack, apply X Bloon Removal to random enemy intending to attack.

${ModID}:RedBloon.NAME: Red Bloon
${ModID}:RedBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Repercussions.NAME: Repercussions
${ModID}:Repercussions.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Deal 7 damage for each Energy or ðŸŸª that card costs to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ReturnToSender.NAME: Return to Sender
${ModID}:ReturnToSender.DESCRIPTION: Draw a Bloon from your discard pile.

${ModID}:RockBloon.NAME: Rock Bloon
${ModID}:RockBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with 9 Health. Exhaust. When this Bloon's target attacks, you gain Block equal to either the attack's damage, or this Bloon's Health, whichever is lesser.

${ModID}:RockPopAndAwe.NAME: Rock, Pop and Awe
${ModID}:RockPopAndAwe.DESCRIPTION: Add a Rock Bloon to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Odd turns: Deal 4 damage per Act. Even turns: Reduce target's Strength by 1 per Act.

${ModID}:ShieldsUp.NAME: Shields Up
${ModID}:ShieldsUp.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random Ability in your draw pile per Act. Gain 50 Mana Shield.

${ModID}:SignalBloon.NAME: Signal Bloon
${ModID}:SignalBloon.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Large Bloon from your Draw Pile. Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health.

${ModID}:SlowingBloon.NAME: Slowing Bloon
${ModID}:SlowingBloon.DESCRIPTION: Draw a Glue Shot to your hand. Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2.

${ModID}:SteadyGrowthBloon.NAME: Steady Growth Bloon
${ModID}:SteadyGrowthBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2. On Turn Start: This Bloon gains 5 Health.

${ModID}:Strengthenator.NAME: Strengthenator
${ModID}:Strengthenator.DESCRIPTION: Apply a âˆž Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust. On Turn Start: All Bloons gains 4 Health.

${ModID}:StunGasBloon.NAME: Stun Gas Bloon
${ModID}:StunGasBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 2. On Damaged: Apply 1 Frail and 1 Weak to the attacker.

${ModID}:SwarmYellowBloon.NAME: Swarm Yellow Bloon
${ModID}:SwarmYellowBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 1 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Charges 3.

${ModID}:TargetPracticeBlimp.NAME: Target Practice Blimp
${ModID}:TargetPracticeBlimp.DESCRIPTION: Apply a âˆž Delay Bloon with !B! Health and Must Hit. Exhaust.

${ModID}:ToxicBloon.NAME: Toxic Bloon
${ModID}:ToxicBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 3 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. On Leak: Apply !M! Poison

${ModID}:TripleThreatBloon.NAME: Triple Threat Bloon
${ModID}:TripleThreatBloon.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 2 Delay Triple Bloon with !D! Health, !B! Shield. When you play a power, this Bloon gains 4 Shield.

${ModID}:WrathOfDread.NAME: Wrath of Dread
${ModID}:WrathOfDread.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy intending to attack.

${ModID}:ZOMG.NAME: ZOMG
${ModID}:ZOMG.DESCRIPTION: Apply a 5 Delay Bloon with !D! Health. Exhaust.

${ModID}:O-02-40.NAME: Dazzling
${ModID}:O-02-40.FLAVOR: If I kill the creatures first, then no one would be killed by the beast!

${ModID}:O-02-56.NAME: Punishment
${ModID}:O-02-56.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Rock Bloon is attacked, and takes 2 or more damage, take 2 damage.
${ModID}:O-02-56.FLAVOR: People have been committing sins since long ago. Why do they commit sins, knowing it's wrong?
